header.title: Precise Similar Topics II
header.description:
This MOD will display a list of similar/related topics at the bottom of your threads, based on finding the most relevant matching Topic Titles.
This MOD was originally written by tas2580 as 'Similar Topics'. It was then modified by Xabi into 'Precise Similar Topics' offering a lighter and more precise query. Now I have modified it further for a complete, light-weight, efficient and pretty implementation in your forum.
header.author-notes: Note: Similar Topics is off by default. Visit the ACP/.MODs section after installation to turn it on.

contributions.position: Added ACP, Updated SQL Code & Styles

changelog.change: Added multi-lingual support for stop-word filtering for boards using non-English language packs
Additional code tweaks and optimizations, especially to improve query time on large boards.
Properly renamed file: similar_topics.php to functions_similar_topics.php.
Add cache option to the ACP to store search results in the cache system. Idea thanks to knmt
Added user permission to allow/disallow users and/or groups permission to view similar topics.
Minor version update due to rewrite of the variables we store in the database.
Prior versions should be uninstalled and this version should be installed fresh.
Re-organized and optimized the code and the database variables so things under the hood make more sense.
Added ability to define Search Period by days, weeks, months or years. Idea thanks to Christian 2.0
Added 'Advanced' Forum settings to allow Admins to customize where each forum can get its Similar Topics from. Idea thanks to DoYouSpeakWak
Built Prosilver and Subsilver2 styling layouts (based on search results, but also inspired by stokerpiller's version at phpbb3bbcodes.com)
Cleaned up all code and packaged in MODX format

action-group.diy-instructions: 1. Go to yourforum/install_similar_topics.php 2. Go to the ACP -> .MODS -> Precise Similar Topics, and adjust the settings to your liking. 3. Go to the ACP -> Permissions, and set up Group permissions to your liking.
